description.value:
The ghost possesses and transforms an adjacent corpse (this requires 2 actions if the ghost is possessing its own corpse; otherwise, it takes an hour).

The possessed corpse uses the statistics of a non-incorporeal undead 2 levels lower than the ghost, and the ghost possesses it as if using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Possession] spell. The specific undead is determined by the nature of the ghost and the corpse-@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Ghoul]{Ghouls}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Wight]{Wights}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Dullahan]{Dullahans} are all common, but almost any undead is possible.

If the ghost ceases to possess the corpse, the corporeal undead is immediately destroyed.
